turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a drink from Starbucks, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande mocha latte with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you said grande mocha latte with 2% milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i'll send your order to 202 main street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 6 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
